title: Commuter

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Beginning of the night abilites (such as being jailed by the Jailor, pirated by a Pirate, etc.) will fail if they are targeting you.
- While you are transcending humanity, everything that should happen to you will not. All attacks will fail, all visits will fail, all abilities will fail. This ability is absolute.
- Your ability cannot be prevented from resolving, even by things which would do it in spite of this attribute.
- At the end of the night, you will receive a list of everyone who had an ability fail against you. You will also not receive any notifications that you should've.
- Transcending humanity will also purge negative effects such as Ice Marks, douses, hexes, etc the first time you do so.
- You may transcend humanity three times.

desc:
Post 641
*And then you beheld...all there was to behold.*
All Immunities (While Transcending)
